div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a _ActInvoiceDetailCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ActInvoiceDetailDrugProductCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ActInvoiceDetailClinicalProductCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ActInvoiceDetailPreferredAccommodationCode
Import all the codes that are contained in ActInvoiceDetailGenericCode
Import all the codes that are contained in x_ActInvoiceDetailPharmacyCode
Import all the codes that are contained in x_ActInvoiceDetailPreferredAccommodationCode

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_ActInvoiceDetailCodeActInvoiceDetailCodeCodes representing a service or product that is being invoiced (billed). The code can represent such concepts as "office visit", "drug X", "wheelchair" and other billable items such as taxes, service charges and discounts.

description.value: Codes representing a service or product that is being invoiced (billed). The code can represent such concepts as "office visit", "drug X", "wheelchair" and other billable items such as taxes, service charges and discounts.
